anya-e1211n:10_0: Bho buddhā tumhepi kho maṁ pāletha.
anya-e1211n:21_0: Buddhassa bhagavato iddhi kiṁ na kare
anya-e1211n:69_0: Bho guṇavaṁ purisa tvampi dānaṁ dehi
anya-e1211n:70_0: Bho guṇavanto purisā tumhe dānaṁ detha
anya-e1211n:89_0: Bho gacchaṁ yaññadatta tvaṁ maṁ pālaya
anya-e1211n:191_0: Jantumpetaṁ kaṭaṁ kāremi teneva kaṭe vā
anya-e1211n:192_0: Jantupete kaṭaṁ kārema teneva kaṭe vā
anya-e1211n:195_0: Jantunā riyena yo koci sukhaṁ pāpuṇati
anya-e1211n:196_0: Jantūhi ariyehi ye keci sukhaṁ pāpuṇanti
anya-e1211n:209_0: Bho satthā tvaṁ sadevakaṁ lokaṁ pālaya
anya-e1211n:223_0: Satthari dhammarāje ko bhattiṁ na ghaṭīyati
anya-e1211n:408_0: Bho yāgu tvaṁ pana khudaṁ bhana
anya-e1211n:428_0: Bho mātā tvaṁ pana ciraṁ jīva
anya-e1211n:454_0: Jambuyā kho pana yo koci jīvati
anya-e1211n:455_0: Jambūhi kho pana ye keci jīvanti
anya-e1211n:520_0: Guṇavatā kulamhā na apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:521_0: Guṇavantehi kulehi na apenti ye keci
anya-e1211n:530_0: Bho gacchaṁ guṇavaṁ tvaṁ pana sugatiṁ gacchāhi
anya-e1211n:550_0: Bho aṭṭhi saṅkhalikaṁ tvaṁ aniccato passa
anya-e1211n:554_0: Aṭṭhinā kāyena yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ nimmitaṁ
anya-e1211n:555_0: Aṭṭhīhi kāyehi yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ nimmitaṁ
anya-e1211n:570_0: Bho daṇḍī tvaṁ pana kammaṁ karohi
anya-e1211n:584_0: Daṇḍini pana me mano na ramati
anya-e1211n:585_0: Daṇḍīsu kho pana me manā na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:590_0: Bho āyu tvaṁ pana jīvitaṁ pālehi
anya-e1211n:604_0: Āyūmhi kho pana manaṁ patiṭhitaṁ sabbadā
anya-e1211n:605_0: Āyūsu kho pana manaṁ patiṭṭhitaṁ sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:611_0: Yāni honti tiliṅgāni anukūlāni yāni ca;
anya-e1211n:616_0: Kānici pana saheva etesaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ idaṁ.
anya-e1211n:622_0: Bho sabbā bhuta kalyāṇaṁ karohi kusalā sadā;
anya-e1211n:623_0: Bho sabbe purisā bhaddaṁ karotha kusalaṁ sadā.
anya-e1211n:625_0: Sabbe bhojāpayī te tu sā nakhīyittha bhojanaṁ.
anya-e1211n:636_0: Sabbasmiṁ buddhadhamme ca sadā ramati me mano;
anya-e1211n:637_0: Sabbesu ca vihāresu thūpe kāresi khattiyoti.
anya-e1211n:640_0: Sabbā alaṅkatā laṅkā therassa viya āsi ca;
anya-e1211n:641_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā gahakūṭaṁ visaṁ khitaṁ.
anya-e1211n:642_0: Bho sabbe ca paje tvampi dānaṁ dadāhi sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:643_0: Bho sabbāyo pajā tumhe sīlaṁ rakkhatha sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:645_0: Sabbāyo diṭṭhiyo hantvā khemaṁ gacchanti paṇḍitā.
anya-e1211n:646_0: Sabbassā assu kaññāya niccaṁ kammaṁ karīyyate;
anya-e1211n:649_0: Sabbāhi ca nadīheva khettaṁ vapati kassako.
anya-e1211n:650_0: Sabbassā assu kaññāya cittaṁ nadeti paṇḍito;
anya-e1211n:652_0: Sabbassā pana taṇhāya vimuttassa natthi bhayaṁ;
anya-e1211n:655_0: Sabbāsaṁ pana gaṅgānaṁ mahogho hoti sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:656_0: Sabbassā neva kaññāya cittaṁ ramati paṇḍito;
anya-e1211n:657_0: Sabbāsu ceva gaṅgāsu macchā caranti sabbadāti.
anya-e1211n:662_0: Bho sabbā bhūta kalyāṇaṁ puññaṁ karohi sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:663_0: Bho sabbānica bhūtāni puññaṁ karotha sabbadā.
anya-e1211n:664_0: Sabbaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ samādāya pāraṁ tiṇṇosi brāhmaṇo;
anya-e1211n:665_0: Sabbāni assu puññāni katvāna tidivaṁ gato.
anya-e1211n:676_0: Sabbasmiṁ puññakammeca sadā ramati me mano;
anya-e1211n:700_0: Pubbā yā kāci kaññā bahuṁ puññaṁ akarī
anya-e1211n:701_0: Pubbā yā kāci kaññāyo bahuṁ puññaṁ akaruṁ
anya-e1211n:702_0: Bho pubbe kaññe bahuṁ puññaṁ akaro
anya-e1211n:703_0: Bho pubbā kaññāyo bahuṁ puññaṁ akarittha
anya-e1211n:704_0: Pubbaṁ yaṁ kiṁci kaññaṁ puññaṁ kārāpayī
anya-e1211n:705_0: Pubbā yā kāci kaññāyo puññe kārāpayī
anya-e1211n:706_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya puññaṁ kataṁ
anya-e1211n:707_0: Pubbāhi yāhi kāhici kaññāhi puññāni katāni
anya-e1211n:708_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya koci anucarī
anya-e1211n:709_0: Pubbāhi yāhi kāhici kaññāhi keci anucariṁsu
anya-e1211n:710_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya ābharaṇaṁ adadī
anya-e1211n:712_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya koci puriso apeto.
anya-e1211n:713_0: Pubbāhi yāya kāhici kaññāhi keci purisā apetā
anya-e1211n:714_0: Pubbāya yāya kāyaci kaññāya mātāpitaro ahesuṁ
anya-e1211n:716_0: Pubbāyaṁ yāya kāyaci kaññāyaṁ cittaṁ patiṭṭhitaṁ
anya-e1211n:717_0: Pubbāsu yāsu kāsuci kaññāsu cittaṁ patiṭṭhitaṁ.
anya-e1211n:720_0: Pubbaṁ yaṁ kiṁci pana bahuṁ puccaṁ akarī
anya-e1211n:721_0: Pubbāni yāni kānici bahuṁ puññaṁ akaruṁ
anya-e1211n:722_0: Bho pubba bhūta tvaṁ bahuṁ puññaṁ akaro
anya-e1211n:723_0: Bho pubbāni bhūtāni bahuṁ puññaṁ akarittha
anya-e1211n:724_0: Pubbaṁ yaṁ kiṁci puññaṁ kārāpayī ekacco
anya-e1211n:725_0: Pubbāni yāni kānici puññe kārāpayiṁsu ekacce
anya-e1211n:752_0: Ekassa garuno kho pana parikkhāro hoti
anya-e1211n:753_0: Ekesaṁ garūnaṁ kho pana guṇaghoso hoti
anya-e1211n:758_0: Ekā kaññā pana devadattaṁ kambalaṁ yācate
anya-e1211n:776_0: Ekaṁ kulaṁ pana bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati
anya-e1211n:794_0: Yo koci taṁ purisaṁ odanaṁ pācāpeti
anya-e1211n:795_0: Ye keci taṁ purisaṁ odanaṁ pācāpenti
anya-e1211n:796_0: Yaṁ kiṁci dāsaṁ gāmaṁ gamayati sāmiko
anya-e1211n:797_0: Ye keci dāse gāmaṁ gamayati sāmiko
anya-e1211n:802_0: Yassa kassaci dānaṁ deti saddho sappuriso
anya-e1211n:812_0: Yā kāci vanitā pana dāsiṁ kammaṁ kārāpeti
anya-e1211n:813_0: Yā kāci vanitāyo dāsī kamme kārāpenti
anya-e1211n:814_0: Yaṁ kiṁci vanitaṁ puññaṁ kārāpeti puriso
anya-e1211n:815_0: Yā kāci vanitāyo puññaṁ kārenti purisā
anya-e1211n:816_0: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya sāmi bhattaṁ bhojāpīyate
anya-e1211n:817_0: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi sāmi bhattaṁ bhojāpito
anya-e1211n:818_0: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya sukhaṁ pāpuṇāti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:819_0: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi sukhaṁ pāpuṇanti sāmikā
anya-e1211n:820_0: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya ābharaṇaṁ deti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:821_0: Yāsaṁ kāsaṁci vanitānaṁ ābharaṇaṁ deti sāmiko
anya-e1211n:822_0: Yāya kāyaci vanitāya apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:823_0: Yāhi kāhici vanitāhi apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:826_0: Yāyaṁ kāyaṁci vanitāyaṁ me cittaṁ na ramati
anya-e1211n:827_0: Yāsu kāsuci vanitāsu me cittāni na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:830_0: Yaṁ kiṁci kulaṁ pana bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati
anya-e1211n:831_0: Yāni kānici kulāni bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavanti
anya-e1211n:832_0: Yaṁ kiṁci bahuṁ puññaṁ kārāpeti koci
anya-e1211n:833_0: Yāni kānici bahuṁ puññaṁ kārenti keci
anya-e1211n:863_0: Tesu bhikkhūsu pana me mano ramati.
anya-e1211n:866_0: Sā khattiyakaññā pana bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati
anya-e1211n:880_0: Tāyaṁ khattiya kaññāyaṁ pasīdati yo koci
anya-e1211n:884_0: Taṁ kulaṁ niccaṁ bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati
anya-e1211n:885_0: Tāni kulāni pana bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavanti
anya-e1211n:886_0: Taṁ kulaṁ uddissa puññaṁ karoti koci
anya-e1211n:887_0: Tāni kulāni uddissa puññāni karonti keci
anya-e1211n:902_0: Eso sisso ca garuṁ dhammaṁ pucchati
anya-e1211n:903_0: Ete sissā ca garuṁ dhammaṁ pucchanti
anya-e1211n:920_0: Esā vanitā pana dāsiṁ kammaṁ kārāpeti.
anya-e1211n:930_0: Etāya vanitāya pana yo koci apeti
anya-e1211n:931_0: Etāhi vanitāhi pana ye keci apenti
anya-e1211n:938_0: Etaṁ kulaṁ pana bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati
anya-e1211n:940_0: Etaṁ kulaṁ pana passati yo koci
anya-e1211n:941_0: Etāni kulāni pana passanti ye keci
anya-e1211n:944_0: Etena kulena pana jano sukhaṁ pāpuṇāti
anya-e1211n:945_0: Etehi kulehi pana janā sukhaṁ pāpuṇanti
anya-e1211n:946_0: Etassa kulassa kho pana dhanaṁ dadāti dhanavā
anya-e1211n:947_0: Etesaṁ kulānaṁ pana dhanaṁ dadanti dhanavantā
anya-e1211n:948_0: Etasmā kulamhā kho pana ekacco na apeti
anya-e1211n:949_0: Etehi kulehi kho pana ekacce na apenti
anya-e1211n:952_0: Etasmiṁ kulamhi pana me mano ramati
anya-e1211n:953_0: Etesu kulesu me manāni na ramanti.
anya-e1211n:956_0: Ayaṁ jano pana taṁ purisaṁ puññaṁ kārāpeti
anya-e1211n:957_0: Ime janā te purise puññaṁ kārāpenti
anya-e1211n:974_0: Ayaṁ kaññā pana bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati
anya-e1211n:984_0: Imāya kaññāya pana apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:985_0: Imāhi kaññāhi pana apeti yo koci
anya-e1211n:992_0: Imaṁ cittaṁ pana attano santānaṁ vijānāti
anya-e1211n:1000_0: Imassa cittassa ovādaṁ deti yo koci
anya-e1211n:1001_0: Imesaṁ cittānaṁ ovādaṁ denti ye keci
anya-e1211n:1010_0: Asu mahārājā catuhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṁ toseti
anya-e1211n:1016_0: Amunā mahārājena kho pana mahājano sucarati
anya-e1211n:1017_0: Amūhi mahārājehi kho pana mahājano sucarati
anya-e1211n:1024_0: Amusmiṁ mahārāje kho pana mahājano pasīdati
anya-e1211n:1025_0: Amūsu mahārājesu kho pana mahājanā pasīdanti.
anya-e1211n:1028_0: Asu upāsikā pana sakkaccaṁ dhammaṁ suṇāti
anya-e1211n:1034_0: Amuyā upāsikāya yo koci pana sucarati
anya-e1211n:1035_0: Amūhi upāsikāhi ye keci pana sucaranti
anya-e1211n:1039_0: Amūhi upāsikāhi ye keci pana apenti
anya-e1211n:1043_0: Amūsu upāsikāsu pana ye keci pasīdanti.
anya-e1211n:1046_0: Aduṁ dhanavaṁ niccaṁ bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavati
anya-e1211n:1064_0: Kohi nāma budho loke vasaṁ kodhassa gacchati;
anya-e1211n:1065_0: Ke hitvā mānusaṁ dehaṁ dibbaṁ yogaṁ upaccaguṁ.
anya-e1211n:1066_0: Kaṁsi tvaṁ assu uddissa pabbajito ca āvuso;
anya-e1211n:1067_0: Keci puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivaṁ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1068_0: Kenāyaṁ pakato satto kuvaṁ sattassa kārako;
anya-e1211n:1069_0: Kehidaṁ pakataṁ bimbaṁ kvannu bibbassa kārako.
anya-e1211n:1070_0: Kena te tādiso vaṇṇo kena te idha mijjhati;
anya-e1211n:1071_0: Kehi me puññakammehi mamaṁ rakkhanti devatā.
anya-e1211n:1073_0: Kesaṁ divāca rattoca sadā puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati.
anya-e1211n:1075_0: Kehi nāma ariyehi puthageva jano ayaṁ.
anya-e1211n:1076_0: Kassa tvaṁ dhammamaññāya vācaṁ bhasayi īdisaṁ;
anya-e1211n:1078_0: Kamhi kāle tayā vīra patthitā bodhimuttamā;
anya-e1211n:1082_0: Kā ca suphassayaṁ dānaṁ mañcapīṭhādikaṁ adā;
anya-e1211n:1083_0: Kāyo nānāvidhaṁ puññaṁ katvāna tidivaṁ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1084_0: Kaṁ bhāvanañca bhāveti kaṁ sīlaṁ paripālayī;
anya-e1211n:1085_0: Kā nāma dāsiyo kamme kārāpayati sāmiko.
anya-e1211n:1086_0: Kāya upāsikāyassu dhammo ca sūyate sadā;
anya-e1211n:1087_0: Kāhi ca sīlavatīhi dhammo ca sūyate sadā.
anya-e1211n:1088_0: Kāya vijjāya me putto pāpuṇāti idaṁ sukhaṁ;
anya-e1211n:1089_0: Kāhi sikkhāhi me puttā pāpuṇanti idaṁ sukhaṁ.
anya-e1211n:1093_0: Kāhi ca pana nadīhi pabhavanti mahānadī.
anya-e1211n:1094_0: Kassā kho pana gaṅgāya mahogho hoti sabbadā;
anya-e1211n:1095_0: Kāsaṁ kho pana kaññānaṁ ābharaṇā bhavanti ca.
anya-e1211n:1096_0: Kassaṁ nadiṁ pana macchā niccaṁ vicaranti sadā;
anya-e1211n:1097_0: Kāsu gaṅgāsu kho macchā niccaṁ vicaranti sadā.
anya-e1211n:1100_0: Kiṁ te jaṭāhi dummedha kiṁ te ajinasāṭiyā;
anya-e1211n:1101_0: Kāni cittāni jāyanti kathaṁ jānema taṁ mayaṁ.
anya-e1211n:1102_0: Kiṁ tvaṁ attavasaṁ disvā mama dajjāsimaṁ dhanaṁ;
anya-e1211n:1103_0: Kāni puññāni katvāna kittakā tidivaṁ gatā.
anya-e1211n:1106_0: Kenāsi dummano tāta purisaṁ kannu yocasi;
anya-e1211n:1107_0: Kehi pupphehi sakkaccaṁ saddho yajati gotamaṁ.
anya-e1211n:1108_0: Kassa so kayirā mettiṁ tamāhu cariyaṁ budhā;
anya-e1211n:1110_0: Kasmā coro ahu me tvaṁ iti rājā apucchitaṁ;
anya-e1211n:1111_0: Kehi nāmapi hetūhi jāyantīti ime janā.
anya-e1211n:1114_0: Kasmiṁ me sivayo kuddhā nāhaṁ passāmi dukkaṭaṁ;
anya-e1211n:1115_0: Kesu puññesu yojeti sakhīnaṁ so sakhāhitoti.
anya-e1211n:1164_0: Tayā cittamhā kho pana bhayaṁ uppajjati
anya-e1211n:1168_0: Tayi citte kho pana kusalacittaṁ patiṭhitaṁ
anya-e1211n:1238_0: Vo no te meti rūpāni padāni padato yato;
anya-e1211n:1239_0: Tato nāmikapantīsu natū vuttāni tāni me.
anya-e1211n:1241_0: Sāmissa vacane ceva vo no saddo pavattati.
anya-e1211n:1242_0: Karaṇe sampadāne ca sāmiatthe ca āgato;
anya-e1211n:1243_0: Te me saddoti viññeyyo viññunā nayadassināti.
anya-e1211n:1606_0: Dasassa gaṇanassa dasaguṇitaṁ katvā sataṁ hoti.
anya-e1211n:1623_0: Nava nāgasahassāni nāge nāge sataṁ rathā
anya-e1211n:1624_0: Rathe rathe sataṁ assā asse asse sataṁ narā
anya-e1211n:1625_0: Nare nare sataṁ kaññā eke kissaṁ satitthiyo
anya-e1211n:1631_0: Kamo kaccāyane eso pāliyā so virujjhati
